plot: A naughty to nasty Flemish variation on candid camera. Each episode consists of loose sketches in the Spanish holiday sea resort Benidorm, popular with Benelux low-budget tourists. In each short scene, one or more actors, dressed as seniors, surprise (mainly young) passersby by atypically mischievous, often rude or even gross behavior.

In each short scene, one or more actors, dressed as seniors, surprise (mainly young) passersby by atypically mischievous, often rude or even gross behavior.

title: Benidorm Bastards
